metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8077 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in the index_urlfetch function in imap/index.c in CyrusIMAP 2.3.19, 2.4.18, and 2.5.6 allows remote attackers to have unspecifiedimpact via vectors related to urlfetch range checks and the start_octetvariable. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2015-8076.

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd-2.4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
